author: brunorafael
title: review on the Micro Ghost
review:
its an excellent little set. A micro set of the ghost that in a simple and brilliant way represents what it is.

between the wedges plates 2x2 in white and the inverted round slopes 1x2 in light bluish grey, there is a great selection of parts. 

Also the build is easy and quick, yet simple enough. 

Cons: the engines in the back are loose and easily fall off. But honestly cant seamed to find a way to do them better.  

Pros: its a very good build. a little and funny ship that just asks for a little diorama around it. which i already gave it. Also very swooshable and playful.

A very good set indeed. Also with a very good part\price ratio, with 50 pieces and the price of 3.99 Euros. very good indeed.
